import React, { useEffect, useRef } from "react"; import { gsap, Power3 } from "gsap/dist/gsap"; import { ScrollTrigger } from "gsap/dist/ScrollTrigger"; import styles from "./ProjectItem.module.scss"; gsap.registerPlugin(ScrollTrigger); const ProjectItem = ({ heroImage, title, role, challenges, technos, linkToSeeLive, imageOne, imageTwo, imageThree, tabletImageOne, tabletImageTwo, tabletImageThree, mobileImageOne, mobileImageTwo, mobileImageThree }) => { let heroTitle = useRef(null); let image = useRef(null); useEffect(() => { gsap.from(heroTitle, { y: 200, ease: "back", delay: 0.5, duration: 1.1 }); gsap.from(image, { width: "100vw", duration: 1 }) }) return ( <>
(image = el)} />

(heroTitle = el)}>{title}

Role :

{role}

Challenges

{challenges}

Technos :

{technos}

See live

DESKTOP

TABLET

MOBILE

Previous Project / next Project
); }; export default ProjectItem;
